title: Mango
description: Vegetarian restaurant and art gallery in a small space with free Wi-Fi, est. Apr 2014. Offers a mix of Thai food (curries, soups) and western food (salads, pita falafel with hummus, cakes) along with beverages like smoothies and coffee. Sells vegan cakes. Labels if a dish is vegan. Sources some produce from the owner's farm. On Tanao Rd one block from Khao San Rd in Banglamphu which is a tourist destination especially for the budget traveler.
streetAddress: 19 Thanon Tanao, Wat Bowon Niwet, Phra Nakhon
